name: Data Dictionary
content:
Data Dictionary:-


Age: Numeric field representing the age of the individual applying for credit.


Sex: Categorical field indicating the gender of the applicant.


Job: Categorical field describing the type of employment or job category of the applicant.


Housing: Categorical field indicating the housing situation of the applicant.


Saving Accounts: Categorical field specifying the status or type of saving accounts held by the applicant.


Checking Account: Categorical field indicating the status or type of checking account held by the applicant.


Credit Amount: Numeric field representing the amount of credit requested by the applicant.


Duration: Numeric field indicating the duration for which the credit is requested or granted.


Purpose: Categorical field describing the purpose for which the credit is requested.


Risk: Categorical field indicating the risk associated with granting credit, often classified as low or high risk based on certain criteria.
